answers.label: You are part of Gen X

truth_bombs.label: of you vote
truth_bombs.footnote: Your generation votes 15% less than your parents and 20% less than theirs. What attitude are you passing on?

truth_bombs.label: are currently in jail

notes.value: Think you have it just as easy as them and you should stop complaining
They will walk into an office and take your job within a week or two

answers.label: You are part of the Baby Boomers!

truth_bombs.label: of you vote

truth_bombs.label: are currently in jail

truth_bombs.label: is the median net worth of people your generation

notes.value: You are spoiled, disrespectful and paranoid about our government
That you are financially irresponsible and haven't paid your fair share of tax
They are paying the price for your pensions and that you are the reason they will never be able to afford a house

notes.value: That they were responsible for Civil rights and rock and roll, even though that was all you
That you got married really young and are far less educated than them
That most things that happened in your lifetime were ancient history until you started talking about them
